title: O kletbách a prokletích
content:
O kletbách a prokletích

The treatise deals with echinopsae and archespores. It also discusses cases of lycanthropy and striga spells.

A treatise dedicated to curses and creatures born of curses: strigas, werewolves, echinopsae and archespores.

Zápisy do Deníku

Bestiář:

Archespory
Echinops
Striga
Vlkodlak

Ingredience:

Míza archespory
Spóry
Srdce strigy
Srst vlkodlaka
Trny echinopsa
Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
500  	100  




Lokace
Antikvarista ve Chrámové čtvrti
Hostinský na Nový Narakort in Akt III will give Geralt this book, along with Kniha polibku, if Geralt pays him 233  for gossip about his customers a second time.
Trunk in the main hall of the Základna Salamandry at the end of Akt III
Knihkupec v Kupecké čtvrti
